original_title: Suspect arrested in connection with double-homicide
original_body_lines: A 26-year-old suspect, residing in the Webada area, has been arrested in connection with a double-homicide that occurred in 2022.

Initially apprehended by the Kadawatha Police for the possession of 13g 600mg of heroin, further investigations uncovered the suspect’s involvement in aiding a shooting incident leading to a double-homicide on 24 March 2023.
